Reason: The configuration 'gc_log_threshold_in_ms' is classified as performance-sensitive. This is because the configuration directly impacts the amount of logging related to Garbage Collection (GC) pauses, which can have a significant effect on system performance. By setting a higher threshold, the logging frequency is reduced, potentially improving performance. Conversely, setting a lower threshold increases the logging frequency, which can impact system performance negatively.
